SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I would love to see music continue in the public school setting…”

– Mrs. Susan Dinger, Elementary Music Educator @Seneca_Valley @ConnoValleyElem https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/music-continue-public-school-setting/
